transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan.
Customer: Hello. Good afternoon sir.
Executive: Good afternoon. Sir, main Hemant Pachauri baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Kahan se?
Executive: IndiaMART se, IndiaMART se baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Haan haan haan boliye boliye sir. Sir aap GT Brothers Enterprises se baat kar rahe hain na sir?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ji ji sir to abhi sir last time hamari baat hui thi 4 tarikh ko then uske baad sir aapke paas ek feedback gaya tha aapne sir usko not satisfied kar diya tha.
Customer: Haan wo maine kal kal hi kiya tha.
Executive: Sir kyunki jis tarah se hame response milna chahiye us tarah se response nahi mil raha hai.
Customer: Like hame hame.
Executive: Nahi aapki baat se main satisfied tha lekin mujhe mera jahan pe maine starting mein jinse baat ki thi na unse baat hui thi ki aapko agar satisfaction na mile ya inquiries aapke hisab se na aaye to do teen mahine baad aap apna stop kar sakte ho.
Executive: Nahi wo sahi baat hai main samajh gaya sir last time jo aapke account manager aaye unse wo unse baat hui hogi lekin abhi jo aapne not satisfied kiya hai na wo kaam ke liye nahi kiya wo mere liye kiya hai sir.
Customer: Nahi aapki udhar to satisfied hi tha main udhar koi dikkat nahi thi.
Executive: Nahi maine IndiaMART ko.
Customer: Haan sir main wahi usi point pe aa raha hun jaise abhi kya hua na us din usse pehle to aapki jo bhi baat hui last time jisse bhi Priyanshi se wo baat haan lekin abhi jo 4 tarikh ko baat hui na hamare aur aapke beech mein.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To wo to us us tarikh jo 4 tarikh ka jo call hua na hamara 5 minute ka.
Customer: Haan. Wo sirf uska feedback tha na ki aapka jo last wala working tha ya fir uske liye jo IndiaMART ke liye diya hai na wo jo aap bol rahe the IndiaMART ke liye diya hai not satisfied wo sir IndiaMART ke liye nahi jayega wo mere liye jayega ki maine aap aapke acche tarike se baat nahi kari hai wo jo not satisfied kar diya hai.
Customer: Haan wo sab aapne mere liye kar diya hai wo IndiaMART ke liye nahi hai.
Executive: Haan to abhi ek isme thoda sa solution ye ho sakta hai.
Executive: Dekhiye main abhi aapko baat kar raha hun na to aapke paas abhi mera ek feedback form bhi aayega jaise last time jo aapne kal not satisfied kiya to usko satisfied kar dena sir kyunki meri market value IndiaMART mein kharab hogi ki main apne client se acche tarike se baat nahi karta hun acche tarike se service nahi de pa raha hun.
Customer: Okay okay nahi wo to main kar dunga lekin meri ek cheez haan maine jis jis bande se ya jis koi bhi manager hoga usse purchase kiya hai usne mujhe bola tha ki aapko agar do teen mahine baad aisi hamari inquiry na mile ya satisfied na ho to hum usi din se band kar denge aapka aur payment aapka wahi ruk jayega.
Executive: Ji ji ek minute sir mujhe main na abhi aapka catalog open kar raha hun bas mujhe ek second dijiye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Main aapka open hai sir mere samne aap bataiye sir mujhe matlab kis tarike se matlab nahi mil raha tha abhi to sir main sare product dekh raha hun aapke.
Executive: Missing price wale matlab price hata diya shayad aapne yahan pe.
Customer: Haan. Derma Singh SPF 15 screen isko kyun hata diya sir abhi aapne yahan pe?
Customer: Nahi humne to wapis rakha tha hata kar.
Executive: Kya kiya sir? Like unse pehle unse hamari baat hui thi na kisi aur se shayad usne bola tha ki aapki price mein kuch error dikha raha hai isliye aap erase karke wapis se dal do to humne wapis se bhi dali thi erase karke.
Executive: To abhi to sir yahan pe ek bhi aapne 14 product apne add kar rakhe hain 14 mein se ek bhi product ka aapne price nahi dala hua hai kya missing aa raha tha sir yahan pe us din to humne check kiya sab kuch correct tha sir haan haan price wagera to sab kuch theek tha fir aapne kyun hata diya uske baad us din hata kar wapis se dala kyunki call aaya tha ki aapki price incorrect dikha rahe hai matlab usme kuch dikha nahi raha hai waise invalid aisa kuch dikha raha hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji main samajh gaya kahin na kahin matlab fees ya pack wag ka kuch issue hoga matlab system mein kuch aur hoga aap kuch aur dal rahe honge yahi issue hoga na sir.
Customer: Haan. Nahi nahi humne price hi dala tha aur wapis se price hi dala humne hata kar.
Executive: Usne bola tha ek baar refresh karke wapis se dal dena.
Customer: Haan to sir fir uske baad dala fir fir aap.
Executive: Haan dala tha. To fir abhi to yahan pe missing price likha aa raha hai. Yahi to ab hame ab continue nahi karna IndiaMART pe to mujhe kahan pe baat karni padegi?
Executive: Aapko IndiaMART pe continue nahi karna hai matlab jaise ki ek minute sir aapne teen mahine pehle IndiaMART pe service li apni.
Customer: Abhi tak ek bhi deal hamari successful nahi hui hai IndiaMART se man lo kabhi chalega.
Executive: Ji. Ek minute ek minute sir jaise Ocean face wash face wash system care facial kit matlab sir buylead wagera to aapke paas sab hai. Buylead to aa hi rahi hai lekin jo buylead aa rahe hain na uski quality achchi nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Quality achchi nahi aa rahi hai to ek minute. Haan aur ye teesri baar hai teesri baar pe hum kya kare humne raat hi dekhi nahi ki hum wait nahi kiya humne wait bhi kiya aapne bola tha waise lekin ab hum nahi karna continue.
Executive: Wo to aapne correct kaha sir abhi kya hai sir main iske liye na apne sir se baat kar leta hun jaisa abhi aap mujhe bata rahe ho aapki jo abhi jo sir aapne feedback diya na last time ki haan wo to main kar deta hun uski aap tension mat lo rating meri kharab ho jayegi IndiaMART mein nahi nahi wo to main satisfied kar dunga.
Customer: Ji ji sir abhi aap mujhe baat karke batana.
Executive: Ji ji sir main sir se baat kar leta hun. Haan wo ji ji okay okay sir thank you sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to discontinue IndiaMART services.

- No successful deals through IndiaMART.

- Buyleads received are of poor quality.

- Price missing from products in catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the feedback issue.

- Executive will discuss concerns with his senior.

- Customer agreed to change feedback to satisfied.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer back.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, catalog, subscription, feedback
